pullRequest.title: Bugfix/169/url helper
pullRequest.bodyText:
URLHelper: update getURL use file.toURI().toURL() instead of 'file:' prefix, add URLHelperTest
Seed: make getLocations return a List , move URL logic to StartupListener.getUrls,remove ESCAPE_AUTHORITY var and toURL function
StartupListener: Update getUrls to create URLs

commit.message:
[#169] URLHelper.getURL fix

use 'file:///' instead of 'file:' as prefix
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/File_URI_scheme#Examples

remove unused import 'java.nio.file.Files'

update Seed,StartupListener,SeedTest

Seed: make getLocations return a List<String> , move URL logic to StartupListener.getUrls,remove ESCAPE_AUTHORITY var and toURL function

StartupListener: Update getUrls to create URLs

nodes.bodyText: Please consider to move the try-catch inside the loop over seed.getLocations(), so we're able to report single broken URLs and keep the rest.

commit.message:
[#169] cleanup

Seed: remove hasValue, update getDemoFiles to return an empty List<URL> if DEMO env var is not set

StartupListener: cleanup getUrls Function
